channel.title: Need help with server npc's .. please (read more)
channel.description: hey i have a monster which is called tormented demons and it doesnt allow me or anyone else to attack it ... could anyone help me to fix this problem also goes aswell for my corpreal beast ... please someone help me... they corpreal beast can attack me but i cant attack it .. please help thank you!

item.title: Need help with server npc's .. please (read more)
item.dc:creator: @joelx617 joelx617
item.description:
@joelx617 wrote:

lol up top he said that rarety the lower it is the more it drops and i did both ways and the demon doesent drop anything what else should i do?

Read full topic

joelx617:

ok i found it but i see items already there under each monster how come i try and kill that monster and nothing drops? please help.

item.title: Need help with server npc's .. please (read more)
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

joelx617:

how do i make my npc drop items like d claws for corpreal beatand tormented demons? because i see on npc list where my tormented demons are and corpr beast but they dont drop anything how could i add a list or something for those 2 monsters to drop items and i add dragon claws in those like rare drop etc…?

NpcDrops.Tsm,
follow the format of it& you should get it, if not, then i’ll show you a basic template of what it should look like, not spoon-feeding you, sorry.

Read full topic

npc = 1155        Tormented_Demon                        450        254
npc = 8133        Corporeal_Beast                        785        740
